verbose_text: Having demonstrated that PEG-Ex4 increased angiogenesis, Akt phosphorylation, VEGF expression in vivo and stimulated tube formation of endothelial cells in vitro, we further hypothesized that PEG-Ex4 stimulates angiogenesis through direct activation of GLP-1R/Akt/VEGF axis in endothelial cells.
evidence: PEG-Ex4 increased angiogenesis, Akt phosphorylation, VEGF
